LanguageData.FT_Chemistry.label: chemistry
LanguageData.FT_Chemistry.description: Artificially synthesize basic chemical compounds such as Neutroamine or plant dye.
LanguageData.FT_Concrete.label: concrete
LanguageData.FT_Concrete.description: Crush and mix stony materials into concrete, a durable, cheap building material whose appearance leaves much to be desired.
LanguageData.FT_ENIAC.label: E.N.I.A.C.
LanguageData.FT_ENIAC.description: Create early-industrial-era electronics and basic electronic computers.
LanguageData.FT_HeavyArtillery.label: heavy artillery
LanguageData.FT_HeavyArtillery.description: Use the E.N.I.A.C. to unlock the secrets of large-calibre artillery ballistics.
LanguageData.FT_IndustrialCannon.label: industrial cannons
LanguageData.FT_Lathe.label: lathe
LanguageData.FT_Lathe.description: Create an electric lathe to mass-produce reinforced barrels and components.
